## AbstractResponseBuilder.askForSurfaceChange() method

Ask the user to change surfaces, for example from a smart speaker to a mobile phone.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract askForSurfaceChange(response?: string | SimpleResponse, notificationLabel?: string): AbstractResponseBuilder<R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  response | string \| [SimpleResponse](./stentor-models.simpleresponse.md) | Response to give as context to the user for the surface change |
|  notificationLabel | string | The label for the notification on the new surface |

<b>Returns:</b>

[AbstractResponseBuilder](./stentor-models.abstractresponsebuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;R&gt;

The builder instance
